backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining authorization, user profiles, and product/order CRUD with admin checks and persistent maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing related frontend files, components, and test IDs for admin access and login UX improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text summarizing various frontend files, their responsibilities, and key behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers with light/dark OKLCH color variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app and links the favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining public and protected admin routes with layout and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminProvis: Disabled banner component formerly used for showing admin provisioning hints on the login page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks definitive admin status and renders access-denied or loading states accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, errors, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact info, quick links, and business details using BUSINESS_CONTACT config.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the main header with navigation, admin links, cart button, and login button.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Renders a hero banner with a background image, title, and tagline for the storefront.
frontend/src/config/businessContact.ts: Defines business contact details including phone, WhatsApp, Instagram, and optional address.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, handling reinitialization on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProductMutati: Provides mutations to add and delete products, invalidating product queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin and tracks loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, providing identity loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Fetches all orders for authenticated users using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: Provides a mutation to place an order by sending items and customer details to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches products and individual product data through queries backed by the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProvisionAdmin.ts: Allows promoting the current user to admin and refreshes admin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file referencing other feature-specific query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining CSS variables, themes, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Manages admin authentication using Internet Identity and admin provisioning state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays a list of customer orders with timestamps, customer info, and item details for admin review.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin UI for listing products and adding/deleting them with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays product listings with images, pricing, quantity input, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow with cart summary, customer form validation, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUsPage.tsx: Shows business contact options including phone, WhatsApp, Instagram, and optional address.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccessPage.tsx: Shows confirmation message and order ID after a successful purchase.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store for cart items with bigint-safe persistence and basic cart operations.
frontend/src/utils/images.ts: Returns a product image URL or a placeholder if missing.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats bigint cent values into USD currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters via query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theming, colors, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing shop features, admin auth needs, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
